content: Thank you so much, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, for building the Dream Home for our new neighbor so quickly.
Hohoho~ Our new neighbor have sneakily arrived at the Astralink. I saw you two working on the house together just now.
I still think a proper introduction is necessary. Starting things off with a friendly gesture is the first step toward a new life.
You arrive at the Camp with Mobai...
So I came here to invite you to the Camp and welcome our new neighbor together.
